name: tap tap Walt
description:
tap tap Walt is about Walter who is set to travel the world, but after hearing about the lack of potable water in some parts of the world, he decided to help. Different levels correspond to a continent (theme-based) and he needs to kill the water contaminants and collect filter materials in order to move forward to the next level.

Controls:

A&D or left &right arrow keys for movement

Spacebar for jumping

Mouse click for shooting

Development:

The idea came about when one of my game classes required us to create a game based on contemporary issues and so I thought this would be a good way to  promote the pursuit of global environmental sustainability whilst having fun.

Artworks were created in Adobe Illustrator inspired from pictures and other artworks created by artists.
